data.title: Knox County Foundation – Your Partner in Philanthropy
data.text:
Your dedication. Our foundation.

Knox County Foundation is a trusted partner to each of you, the valued members of our community. And the truth is, we couldn’t do what we do without you. You’re passionate about leaving a powerful legacy and reaching your goals for community advancement. While we equip you with ways to make an impact and support you each step of the way, you make it all happen. For the past 80 years, we’ve wholeheartedly facilitated community growth. Who creates the ideas? Who provides the funds? Who turns each opportunity into reality? That’s all you.

INVESTING IN OUR COMMUNITIES

Thank you for supporting the work of Knox County Foundation.

FUND ADVISOR PORTAL

Access your fund information anytime with our online Fund Advisor Portal!

GRANT PORTAL

Create or Login to your organization's online grant portal to submit or accept a grant.

SERVING WITH HIGH STANDARDS

KCF achieved national accreditation from the National Council on Foundations receiving the National Standards Seal.

$ 5MILL

DONATED IN 2023 BY MORE THAN 500 DONORS

448

SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED IN 2023 TOTALING $1 MILL+

$ 7MILL

AWARDED IN NONPROFIT GRANTS FOR 2023

190%

GROWTH IN ASSETS OVER LAST 10 YEARS TO $100 MILL+

Testimonials

We have seen firsthand what scholarships can do to help kids get a boost in life. These are a joy in our life and they will continue for a long time.

GERALD & BARBARA LINDSTROM

SCHOLARSHIP DONORS

We find the grant process to be collaborative, thorough, and very professional. Entrusting the Foundation with our organization fund is easy and gives us peace of mind in the investing process.

NICK CLARK, YMCA

GRANT RECIPIENT

YPI is an amazing organization. My communication skills increased tremendously through my involvement. As I begin at Ohio University, I believe I am more prepared for college challenges.

CHLOE JARRETT

YPI MEMBER

My successes have been built on the hard work and generosity of many who came before me, and the Knox County Foundation has been an immense support along that path.

CLAYTON CURTS

OSU MEDICAL STUDENT

About Us

We are excited to serve as your Partners in Philanthropy. For the last 80 years, we've been improving the quality of life for Knox County residents, aiding organizations in accomplishing their missions and responding to the ever-changing needs of our communities. Whether you want to support scholarships, organizations, or causes that are important to you, or whether you seek financial grants or scholarships, the team at Knox County Foundation is here to help you meet your goals.

E-Newsletter

Stay up to date with all the latest news and grant deadlines with our bi-monthly e-newsletter.
